channel.title: spyware on Internet Freedom Foundation
channel.description: Recent content in spyware on Internet Freedom Foundation

item.title: SC appoints a committee to examine the use of Pegasus Spyware in India
item.description: Supreme Court has appointed a committee of technical experts overseen by Justice R. V. Raveendran, to examine the use of Pegasus Spyware on Indian Citizens.

item.title: #4 Cybersec Charcha: A Global overview of the state of surveillance after the pegasus revelations
item.description: Your monthly round-up of all things cybersecurity! This edition of Cybersec Charcha focuses on spyware, the Pegasus Project reports and the booming surveillance industry.
